Autenticação
==================

Login
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Serviço utilizado para autenticar-se e receber um token que deverá ser enviado junto com algumas requisições.

**Endpoint**

::

    GET {{URL_AMBIENTE}}/security/api/quotation?identifier=c051cb56-6b95-4741-9bc2-6caf9978252d

**Response**
::
        {
            "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImE0MWU2NDJkMDU4YzQ3OGM3MzljMTAzZGY5Zjg4YTFkIiwidHlwIjoiSldUIn0..fvJHyCAoQSv1d6IFmu1JtsxHKX2SRQnDiuW5gULUemjAilulkAFSH2Thx7ig8robizFVQjNECzp-Ev7hEBb7nGdWb2IzEcvxr8kBhxlS1ECpsjJFQKDRrVTWHjZU8cffFSmDuthqDATsZMaBsNsK9NX8lzFBd7bue6IDjatBz0Pz9oH22yWsSLQgr-2jGlW2pD5YrsIFbKrCoK3Ur5TC_ctkwDxAND4C0B0KDKktqISp4FxMWZlSo8-XlpeNUwQnxeIwGX-8Ew9nUR-g0OMUcOJX6XL3z2mCqzV3z-uCMxE5cPZzmLQwsq0S6ajJ4mPrg2RffFzX4vto50lUsGZkXg",
            "expires_in": 43200,
            "token_type": "Bearer"
        }
